Text.Page:
Originally, Karas guarded the Lake of Tears, but he vanished long ago.

Now, all manner of creatures hunt around the lake. Worst of the lot are the {@LinkCreature:23#5#moonlight stalkers}.

They've killed dozens of poporis in the past few months. If you could hunt them down, we would breathe more easily.
Those pesky cats won't bother us again! Your intervention has helped avert a cat-astrophe. Hee, hee!
